0:
- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__LOAD_EXAMPLES
  value: 'False'
- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__HIDE_SENSITIVE_VAR_CONN_FIELDS
  value: 'False'
- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__DEFAULT_TIMEZONE
  value: Australia/Perth
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__BASE_URL
  value: 'https://airflow.${SECRET_DOMAIN}'
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__DEFAULT_WRAP
  value: 'True'
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__EXPOSE_CONFIG
  value: 'True'

- secretRef:
    name: airflow-secrets
- configMapRef:
    name: airflow-user-config

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>

<Server version="8">
  <Name>${CONFIG_OVENMEDIAENGINE_NAME}</Name>
  <Type>origin</Type>
  <IP>*</IP>
  <PrivacyProtection>false</PrivacyProtection>
  <StunServer>stun.l.google.com:19302</StunServer>

  <Modules>
    <HTTP2>
      <Enable>true</Enable>
    </HTTP2>
    <LLHLS>
      <Enable>true</Enable>
    </LLHLS>
    <P2P>
      <!-- disabled by default, experimental -->
      <Enable>true</Enable>
      <MaxClientPeersPerHostPeer>2</MaxClientPeersPerHostPeer>
    </P2P>
  </Modules>

  <Bind>
    <Providers>
      <RTSPC>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </RTSPC>
      <OVT>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </OVT>
      <RTMP>
        <Port>$${env:OME_RTMP_PROV_PORT:1935}</Port>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </RTMP>
      <SRT>
        <Port>$${env:OME_SRT_PROV_PORT:9999}</Port>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </SRT>
      <MPEGTS>
        <Port>$${env:OME_MPEGTS_PROV_PORT:4000-4005/udp}</Port>
      </MPEGTS>
      <WebRTC>
        <Signalling>
          <TLSPort>$${env:OME_WEBRTC_SIGNALLING_TLS_PORT:3334}</TLSPort>
          <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
        </Signalling>
        <IceCandidates>
          <IceCandidate>$${env:OME_HOST_IP:*}:$${env:OME_WEBRTC_CANDIDATE_PORT:10000-10004/udp}</IceCandidate>
          <TcpRelay>$${env:OME_HOST_IP:*}:$${env:OME_WEBRTC_TCP_RELAY_PORT:3477}</TcpRelay>
          <TcpForce>true</TcpForce>
          <TcpRelayWorkerCount>1</TcpRelayWorkerCount>
        </IceCandidates>
      </WebRTC>
    </Providers>

    <Publishers>
      <OVT>
        <Port>$${env:OME_ORIGIN_PORT:9000}</Port>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </OVT>
      <LLHLS>
        <TLSPort>$${env:OME_LLHLS_STREAM_TLS_PORT:3334}</TLSPort>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </LLHLS>
      <WebRTC>
        <Signalling>
          <TLSPort>$${env:OME_WEBRTC_SIGNALLING_TLS_PORT:3334}</TLSPort>
          <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
        </Signalling>
        <IceCandidates>
          <IceCandidate>$${env:OME_WEBRTC_CANDIDATE_IP:*}:$${env:OME_WEBRTC_CANDIDATE_PORT:10000-10004/udp}</IceCandidate>
          <TcpRelay>$${env:OME_WEBRTC_CANDIDATE_IP:*}:$${env:OME_WEBRTC_TCP_RELAY_PORT:3477}</TcpRelay>
          <TcpForce>true</TcpForce>
          <TcpRelayWorkerCount>1</TcpRelayWorkerCount>
        </IceCandidates>
      </WebRTC>
    </Publishers>
  </Bind>

  <VirtualHosts>
    <VirtualHost include="VHost*.xml" />
    <VirtualHost>
      <Name>default</Name>
      <Distribution>${APP_DNS_OVENMEDIAENGINE}</Distribution>

      <Host>
        <Names>
          <Name>${APP_DNS_OVENMEDIAENGINE}</Name>
          <Name>${APP_IP_OVENMEDIAENGINE}</Name>
        </Names>
        <TLS>
          <CertPath>/tls/server.pem</CertPath>
          <KeyPath>/ssl/tls.key</KeyPath>
          <ChainCertPath>/tls/ca.pem</ChainCertPath>
        </TLS>
      </Host>

      <CrossDomains>
        <Url>*</Url>
      </CrossDomains>

      <Applications>
        <Application>
          <Name>app</Name>
          <Type>live</Type>
          <OutputProfiles>
            <HardwareAcceleration>false</HardwareAcceleration>
            <OutputProfile>
              <Name>stream</Name>
              <OutputStreamName>$${OriginStreamName}</OutputStreamName>

              <Playlist>
                <Name>watch</Name>
                <FileName>watch</FileName>
                <Options>
                  <WebRtcAutoAbr>true</WebRtcAutoAbr>
                </Options>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>direct</Name>
                  <Video>bypass_video</Video>
                  <Audio>bypass_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_h264_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_1080p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_h264_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_1080p_5fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_h264_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_720p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_h264_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_720p_30fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_vp8_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_vp8_1080p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_vp8_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_vp8_1080p_5fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_vp8_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_vp8_720p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_vp8_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_vp8_720p_30fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>llhls_h264_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_1080p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>aac_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>llhls_h264_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_1080p_5fps</Video>
                  <Audio>aac_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>llhls_h264_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_720p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>aac_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>llhls_h264_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_720p_30fps</Video>
                  <Audio>aac_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
              </Playlist>

              <Encodes>
                <Video>
                  <Name>bypass_video</Name>
                  <Bypass>true</Bypass>
                </Video>
                <Audio>
                  <Name>bypass_audio</Name>
                  <Bypass>true</Bypass>
                </Audio>
                <Audio>
                  <Name>aac_audio</Name>
                  <Codec>aac</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>256000</Bitrate>
                  <Samplerate>48000</Samplerate>
                  <Channel>2</Channel>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Audio>
                <Audio>
                  <Name>opus_audio</Name>
                  <Codec>opus</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>256000</Bitrate>
                  <Samplerate>48000</Samplerate>
                  <Channel>2</Channel>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Audio>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_h264_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Codec>h264</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>10000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>1080</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>fast</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_h264_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Codec>h264</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>75000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>1080</Height>
                  <Framerate>5</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>slow</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_h264_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Codec>h264</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>6000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>720</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>fast</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_h264_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Codec>h264</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>3000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>720</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>faster</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_vp8_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Codec>vp8</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>10000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>1080</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>fast</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_vp8_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Codec>vp8</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>75000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>1080</Height>
                  <Framerate>5</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>slow</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_vp8_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Codec>vp8</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>6000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>720</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>fast</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_vp8_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Codec>vp8</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>3000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>720</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>faster</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
              </Encodes>
            </OutputProfile>
          </OutputProfiles>
          <Providers>
            <OVT />
            <WebRTC>
              <Timeout>30000</Timeout>
              <CrossDomains>
                <Url>*</Url>
              </CrossDomains>
            </WebRTC>
            <RTMP />
            <SRT />
            <RTSPPull />
            <MPEGTS>
              <StreamMap>
                  <Stream>
                    <Name>stream_$${Port}</Name>
                    <Port>$${env:OME_MPEGTS_PROV_PORT:4000-4005/udp}</Port>
                  </Stream>
              </StreamMap>
            </MPEGTS>
          </Providers>
          <Publishers>
            <AppWorkerCount>1</AppWorkerCount>
            <StreamWorkerCount>8</StreamWorkerCount>
            <OVT />
            <WebRTC>
              <Timeout>30000</Timeout>
              <Rtx>false</Rtx>
              <Ulpfec>false</Ulpfec>
              <JitterBuffer>false</JitterBuffer>
            </WebRTC>
            <LLHLS>
              <OriginMode>true</OriginMode>
              <ChunkDuration>0.5</ChunkDuration>
              <!-- PartHoldBack SHOULD be at least three times the Part Target Duration -->
              <PartHoldBack>1.5</PartHoldBack>
              <SegmentDuration>6</SegmentDuration>
              <SegmentCount>10</SegmentCount>
              <CrossDomains>
                <Url>*</Url>
              </CrossDomains>
            </LLHLS>
          </Publishers>
        </Application>
      </Applications>
    </VirtualHost>
  </VirtualHosts>
</Server>

awk -v cert_num=0 "split_after==1 {n++;split_after=0} /-----END CERTIFICATE-----/ {split_after=1} n==cert_num {print}" /ssl/tls.crt > /tls/server.pem && awk -v cert_num=1 "split_after==1 {n++;split_after=0} /-----END CERTIFICATE-----/ {split_after=1} n==cert_num {print}" /ssl/tls.crt > /tls/ca.pem && awk -v cert_num=2 "split_after==1 {n++;split_after=0} /-----END CERTIFICATE-----/ {split_after=1} n==cert_num {print}" /ssl/tls.crt >> /tls/ca.pem
